mapper.sql: id, user_id, user_name, divide_config, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by
mapper.select: SELECT dl.id as id, m.parent_id as parentId, m.parent_name as parentName, dl.divide_config as divideConfig FROM divide_layer_config dl INNER JOIN member m on dl.user_id = m.id where 1 = 1 and m.account != #{userName} and m.super_path like concat('%/',#{userName},'/%')
